title: Is my client bugged?
body:
Hey I’m new to lol and I’ve got a couple issues.
Since the latest patch went live I haven’t been receiving any missions. 
Also, I’ve gotten a few champion capsules and they all contain 450 blue essence. Aren’t they supposed to contain a champion?

replies.body:
Welcome to League, Killlick!  Cactopus goes into a [better breakdown here ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/hAaYMrEs-leveling-and-rewards-early-impressions-and-adjustments), but you will get some goodies as you continue to level.  With each milestone you could get some extra content as well.  

You will also receive your First Win of the Day mission at level 15.

In the meantime you can still find more shards through finding chests with Mastery chests and Honor.  For example, you recently unlocked Zilean and getting an S or higher grade will reward you with a chest from him.  I hope that helps!
